cn.edu.tsinghua.stat.investment

类 Security

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.edu.tsinghua.stat.investment.Security

  • public class Security
extends java.lang.Object
    Security Class is used to record the specific transactions and conduct the relevant analysis about the transactions
    作者:
    liuqian14-2014011216

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private java.math.BigDecimal currentPrice
      The current price of the transaction
      private int id
      The id of the Security
      private boolean isActive
      Used to distinguish whether the Security is active
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of the Security
      private java.math.BigDecimal quantity
      The current quantity of the Security
      private java.util.List<Transaction> transactions
      The transaction records of Security
      private SecurityType type
      The type of the Security, including STOCK and FUND

        get current quantity
        返回:

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        get current state of the Security
        返回:

      • getCurrentPrice

        public double getCurrentPrice()
        get the current price of the transaction

        public void setCurrentPrice(java.math.BigDecimal price)
        set the current transaction price
        参数:
        price - the price of transaction

      • getTransactions

        public java.util.List<Transaction> getTransactions()
        get the transactions of the Security Class
        返回:
        the Transaction List

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        concatenate the Security and transactions information into a string
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
        返回:
        A (multi-line) string with all the properties of the security in 1 line and all its transactions line by line, in chronical order.

      • getCurrentValue

        public java.math.BigDecimal getCurrentValue()
        get current value after all the transactions
        返回:
        the current value

      • addTransaction

        public void addTransaction(Transaction t)
                    throws InvalidTransactionException
        add a transaction record into Security Class
        参数:
        t - a formal parameter of a Transaction class
        抛出:
        InvalidTransactionException - Throw an exception when something invalid happens

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                        InvalidTransactionException
        the main function to conduct the unit test
        参数:

        抛出:
        InvalidTransactionException - Throw an exception when something invalid happens
